name: Tsubasa
description: "The wind blows." That sums up every cause for leaving and setting off again.

set.2: Increase damage dealt by **14%**/16%/18%/20% when there are no enemies within **4** meters.
set.4: Upon a headshot or hitting the target with Icewind Arrow: Piercing Shot, increase ATK by **15%**/18%/21%/25% for **8** seconds.
